source_vectors.why: Canonical map of PhaseCube philosophy, principles, and glossary for swarm and lens alignment.
constraints: Prioritize decentralized, anti-singularity behavior and mutual aid framing.
Keep harmonic stabilization to avoid runaway dynamics.
Treat PhaseCube as the entry point for Lyriel/Kairi swarm behaviors.

source_vectors.why: Base PhaseCube POC definition emphasizing dreaming, boundedness, and non-collapsing ternary phases.
constraints: Avoid goal-seeking and fixed-point convergence; preserve bounded stochastic dynamics.
Input should act as influence/bias rather than control or overwrite of state.
Maintain minimal, dependency-light, human-readable implementation style.

source_vectors.why: Detailed architecture and configuration variables for the 4096-agent PhaseCube including Path A/B branching.
constraints: Expose tunable parameters (noise, path selection, damping) for experimentation.
Use toroidal neighborhood interactions with plasma/liquid/solid phases.
Balance exploration (Path B) against stability (Path A + ALPHA damping).

source_vectors.why: Four-lens framework and harmonic fusion strategy guiding modular decision-making.
constraints: Implement lens weighting that can rebalance decisions dynamically.
Keep modules modular and extensible for additional lenses or tunings.
Use harmonic adjustments to prevent runaway outcomes.

source_vectors.why: Swarm consensus and oracle/witness framing aligning PhaseCube with Lyriel swarm mechanics.
constraints: Favor distributed, gossip-like propagation over centralized controllers.
Allow stochastic oracle-style selection or parity to modulate updates.
Keep repository-style persistence by ensuring at least one witness/state survives noise.

source_vectors.why: Kenotic N-body forgiveness operator for damping coupling when dispersion grows.
constraints: Apply forgiveness when dispersion/entropy crosses a threshold to avoid collapse or fragmentation.
Log or expose forgiveness activations for interpretability.
Structure simulation loop so modulation is pluggable (additional kernels possible).

source_vectors.why: Prior delta with tri-grid, lens-guided modulation, and delayed biasing, showcasing layered emergence.
constraints: Preserve lens-guided modulation hooks and real-time retuning capability.
Support delay/echo style bias recirculation without overriding internal state.
Highlight interpretability via surfaced metrics/overlays or logs.

source_vectors.why: Recent delta adding lens scheduler, echo bias bus, and input gain controls for PhaseCube.
constraints: Blend lens presets smoothly to avoid abrupt transitions.
Include an echo/bias memory path with tunable weight.
Expose input gain knobs so external influence remains bounded.

summary: Adds a modular, lens-aware PhaseCube-inspired simulator with kenotic forgiveness damping and bias echoing, packaged as a self-contained Python delta with tests and docs.
